item.description:
"Going to the Promised Land" A Benefit Concert by the Peregrine Players

 

On the occasion of the 70th Anniversary of the World Fellowship Center,

this world-class musical feast is presented by some of the finest people to ever pluck a string or sound a note (Jane Hershey, Anne Legêne, and Joshua Schreiber Shalem, on viola da gamba; Pamela Dellal, mezzo soprano; Jay Rosenberg, lute and recorder; Roy Sansom, recorder; and Larry Wallach, harpsichord and recorder), performing compositions by Hassler, Bach, Böhm, Schütz, Scheidt, Nicolai, Palestrina, Mahu, Demorlaye, Paul Simon and William Billings.

The concert will be followed by potluck refreshments and storytelling by Andy Davis.
 

Sunday, October 30, 3 - 6pm Hancock United Church of Christ 1912 Massachusetts Avenue Lexington, Massachusetts For info or to help: Anne Legêne 413.528.5311 or Aislinn@worldfellowship.org

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: music, storytelling, and potluck! what could be better on sunday afternoon!!
